lyrics:
6 contributorschild of the earth lyricsverse 1
as my
body
begins
to decay
roses
entwine
my bones
where i lay

chorus
i am the one from the earth
take my hand and ill show you
my sacred home
stand all alone in the light
close your eyes and ill guide you
into the darkness

verse 2
forest
creatures
stay close
to their kin
cleansing
waters
erase
all my sins
